$
February 10, 1955
Miss Martha C, Howard
Secretary
The Fund for Adult Education
1444 Wentworth Avenue
Pasadena 5* California
Dear Miss Howard:
This is to acknowledge with sincere appreciation
information from you relating that the sum of ;?1500
has been approved by the Fund as a grant to provide for
the continuation of the NAEB,,personnel_ placement service
to June 30, 1956. It is our understanding that'the
provisions and terms of this grant will be the same as
set forth in your letters of March 26, 1954 and April 23,
1954 to Mr. Ausmus.
Also, it is our understanding that the additional
payment of $1500 will be made at the time payment of the
second year grant is made.
Obviously, we snail be happy to provide you with
progress reports and an audited financial statement at
the end of our fiscal year.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
President

cc: Harry J. Skornia
